attributes.action: Review the statutory motorway speed limit of 70mph imposed in 1960s
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Review the statutory motorway speed limit of 70mph imposed in 1960s with a view to increasing this limit where appropriate to better match the capabilities of modern motor cars

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Review the statutory motorway speed limit of 70mph imposed in 1960s."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11003.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/speedlimit/
